products.title: Harper Mulberry
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Harper Mulberry Deluxe Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Deluxe Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 300mm Max Width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm)
 	Min Drop: 400mm Max Drop: 2500mm
 	Fabric Composition: 62% Polyester 38% Cotton
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Sidewinder control.
 	Fabric Lining: Ivory poly cotton lining as standard, white blackout lining and interlining available.
 	Fixings: Fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: Robust aluminium headrail, 30mm wide x 43mm deep.
 	Finish: Fabric attached to headrail with velcro.

products.title: Acacia Mulberry
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Acacia Mulberry Standard Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 4000mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm &amp; 127mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Dark Purple (4157)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Dark Purple (4157) Velux Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
A simple, stylish way to soften incoming light and achieve basic privacy.

 	Diffuses sunlight
 	Provides privacy
 	Installs in minutes
 	15 different colours and designs

products.title: Dark Purple (4561) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Dark Purple (4561) (Blackout) Velux Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Dark Purple &amp; White (4561 &amp; 1016)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Dark Purple & White (4561 & 1016) Velux Duo Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Duo Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux duo blackout blind is a blackout blind and a pleated blind in one. It offers the best of both worlds, blackout at anytime and softly diffused natural light all day. It is available in all blackout blind colours in combination with a white pleated blind.

 	Blackout at anytime.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Softly diffuses incoming daylight.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Installs in minutes.
